website_summaries.verdict: This highly-rated restroom mirror showcases supreme luxury from a reliable company.
pros: Screws and switches are not visible
Does not require an electrician to hardwire, unlike other LED mirrors
cons: Can be a little troublesome to install
Silver around the sides can rust without proper maintenance

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful lighted LED mirrors
customer_reviews.text: We received these 2 mirrors almost a year ago. They are so elegant and make our vanity look like a million bucks! Last month one of our mirrors stopped working so I emailed the company. They replied on the same day (on a Sunday) and sent a new one right away. Not only are we impressed by the mirrors...we are impressed with their customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, bright mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror--clean and bright: better illuminated than most LED mirrors and reasonably priced. Also easy to install. I had to order 6 to get two that were unbroken, so be prepared and forewarned: it may take some tries before you get the mirror you can actually hang--the packaging is crazily unprotective.
customer_reviews.author: Dana D. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: This mirror is easy to install and looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is easy to install and looks beautiful. We hard-wired it to a switch with no issues. We purchased another mirror for a second bathroom with just two side-lights and this one to go over a sink where I needed more light, and it works perfectly! I love the light it gives off when on by itself--not overpowering, but bright enough to see clearly. I usually opt for warm lighting, but didn't want that in this space, and this mirror is better than I had hoped. Lots of compliments from others! VERY pleased with the product and the seller!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Parcell

customer_reviews.title: Mirror is beautiful, and easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: Mirror is beautiful, and easy to hang. Light is very bright and you can easily use for make up or shaving etc. I needed to plug this mirror in, not hardwired. I didn't give 5 stars, as I could not find anyway to have the cord exit the frame to go to a plug. I used a tin snip to make an hole in the frame, it worked but there was no other way. The instructions were for a different model than what I received.
customer_reviews.author: Ct Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror. I initially thought I might need to put pendant lights to have more lighting but this mirror light puts out a lot of light! I have a small bathroom and it's perfect. It looks good. I'm completely happy and the price was very reasonable. I was Looking at similar products at 24x36 for close to $400. Honestly, the 21" looks better than what I imagined the 24" would. I recommend this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Biel

customer_reviews.title: As long as your mirrors survive shipping, you’ll be happy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for a bathroom remodel. They were half the price of similar mirrors at my local plumbing supply store at which I purchased most of my fixtures. The contractor was impressed with the quality as he said that most of lighted mirrors he has installed had light leaking out of the side of the fixture. He explained that when light leaks out the sides, imperfections in the wall is exposed as light skims down the surface. It would be nice if there was a wider version of these mirrors, but they look great in our bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, and looks fantastic! You have to run an outlet up to the lower half of where the mirror will mount, and add a switch as the mirror doesn't have one.
customer_reviews.author: Geetar

customer_reviews.title: They looked great at first
customer_reviews.text: Maybe will update review, bought 6 for 2 commercial bathrooms. They looked great at first, but one quit working. Haven’t contacted seller yet, but huge pain in my ass to deal with unhappy customer and pay my electrician to replace it- if they replace.
customer_reviews.author: Carpetpeddler

customer_reviews.title: Mirror was broken.
customer_reviews.text: The mirror came broken. I did not open the box until our electrician was trying to install it and opened the box to find it broken. I am unable to return it Since it’s past the 30 days return policy. DO NOT BUY PRE-OPENED RETURNS BECAUSE YOU DO NOT KNOW IF THE PRODUCT IS BROKEN OR MISSING PARTS. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: fccarr17

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great people
customer_reviews.text: I love the mirror and bought another as soon as the first arrived. There was a problem with the second, BUT, the manufacturer, Hamilton Hills, was exceptionally quick to respond and take care of the problem. I love the product and the professional people at Hamilton Hills. I'll definitely by from them again.
customer_reviews.author: lorraine zenka

customer_reviews.title: Mirror broken intransit
customer_reviews.text: The mirror was broken in transit - it cracked. Unfortunately when you handled the box you didn't hear broken glass moving inside. It's only upon opening and unpacking it that the cracked mirror was discovered. No recourse and now mirror bought for around US$250 is currently listed at over US$900. OMG. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: F. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, bright mirror!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a makeup mirror for my daughter. The look is very modern, we were amazed how bright the lights are. It arrived perfectly padded, installation was very easy. I bought a remote outlet for it so there is no need to hardwire it. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little rusty...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mirror for my wife for her birthday and she was super exited. The mirror arrived and was perfecr for her needs. She loves it! Unfortunately recently the silver around the sides of the mirror has started to rust. I don't know why, we do not have it in a restroom like you would assume. But it's hanging in a make up only studio that is dry as can be at all times. As i was investigating the rust mark. I was noticing the steel case is bubbling also...its unfortunate i had high hopes for this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install/Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy, took about 20 minutes to get it where we wanted it and about 20 more minutes hard-wiring it, using the same connection from the sconce it was replacing. Looks great, and since this a guest bathroom, and fairly small (half bath), it illuminates the entire room without the need for a can light. Just flip the switch and on it goes. Packaging for shipping was also excellent, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T Rando

customer_reviews.title: Large mirror, bright LEDs
customer_reviews.text: We were searching for a mirror with included lighting and this one has been perfect for our bathroom. The LEDs are very bright and the mirror is large, which makes our small bathroom seem larger.

customer_reviews.title: These Mirrors Get "Wows"
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a pair of these mirrors for a multi-room home upgrade in early 2017 and think they're fantastic. We have them mounted over side-by-side bathroom sinks and everyone who has been in that room for the first times really does say, "Wow!". Folks love 'em. Great amount of light and we never get tired of looking at them. To the folks at Hamilton Hills: Thanks for a great addition to our home. Only things that could make them even better (Just a wish list to HH): Dimmable, light temperature adjustment, RGB capability(!).

product_meta.title: Lighted LED Frameless Backlit Wall Mirror | Polished Edge Silver Backed Illuminated Frosted Rectangle Mirrored Plate | Commercial Grade Vanity or Bathroom Hanging Rectangle Vertical Mirror (21" x 36")
product_meta.description: See for yourself why we have the top selling backlit Dimmable LED lighted mirrors. Our slim line, modern, contemporary, frosted, lit mirror offers exceptional quality at an affordable price. Constructed and designed with responsible, lasting materials on your commercial grade lighted bathroom mirror. A simple edgeless, plate glass, design features a simple rectangular frosted opaque trim. Our frosting is treated with anti finger print process to keep your mirror looking beautiful. Soft hue 3000K CRI 85 lights with a total of 26W and 2500 lumens. Dimmable with LED Dimmer. This is a natural light optimal for make up and vanities. This is opposed to the harsh fluorescent alternatives. Our lights are energy saving with no mercury, no UV and no flickering. The mirror-backing mounts directly to the wall with simple screws and anchors provided. Use the provided level to ensure its installed straight. Simple screw hole slots are wide to allow horizontal movement when installing. The electrical plug can be plugged into an outlet directly or cut to hard wire into a junction box. The mirror is designed to work with a wall switch or by using the switch on the side of the mirror. The glass is covered with a vinyl backing to secure the glass in the event of an emergency or accident. Once the backing is attached to the wall the front smooth edged, glass plate, gently slides onto the back. We know you are going to love your mirror as much as we do and are proud of every piece we deliver. USA Company with 3 Generations of Family Values.
feature_bullets: SOPHISTICATED DESIGN: Slim 3 inch depth with no visible screws or switches. 21" x 36" Dimming Backlit Frosting with finger print protection. UL listed plug that can be cut for direct wire to junction box. Glass free LED light chips for even light distribution with exceptional color accuracy. CRI 85 26W and 2500 lumens at 3000K unlike the harsh white light used by other brands. LED energy savings up to 68%. Instant on, no flicker, no UV, mercury free light. Lasts up to 31.5 years.

SAFE AND EASY TO INSTALL: Our authentic silver backed glass comes with safety polished edges for protection and a beautiful finished appearance. 1/4" Triple coated silver backed mirror with CAT 1 Vinyl backing to secure glass in the event of an accident. Adjustable mounting system which allows for quick install including a built in level. Hardware and screws included.

3 GENERATIONS OF EXCELLENCE: Our family has been manufacturing and producing mirrors for over 3 generations. We stand by the quality of our product and your experience. A family owned business with simple principles. Affordable quality in America.

EXCEPTIONAL QUALITY: We use premium materials not found in other lesser quality imitation mirrors you will see. Our mirrors are made to strict trade-secret standards and pass a rigorous 8 point inspection. Every mirror comes with our certification of authenticity.
